channel.title: Abouts on Emily Hesketh Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Emily Hesketh Portfolio

item.title: About: Me
item.description: My name is Emily Hesketh, I am also known as Milly. I will be graduating in 2018 with a degree in BA (Hons) Interior Design from Birmingham City University. I have thoroughly enjoyed my time study at university, and during the three years I have worked on numerous projects, across different design sectors, including live projects. A variety of my work can be found on this website, showing a range of design communication skills I have acquired.
